title: Plastic Memories
description: A job where you must learn to let go of those you’ve grown attached to in time. A story about feelings that have an expiration date, and how to truly live them.

title: Sword Art Online
description: When a virtual game becomes reality, every decision has a cost. An adventure about survival, trust, and human connections in a digital world.

title: Darling in the FranXX
description: Battles for humanity’s future intertwine with the search for identity and closeness. A coming-of-age story about fear of loneliness and fragile human bonds.

title: Charlotte
description: Superpowers seem like a gift until you have to pay for their consequences. A drama about choice, responsibility, and lost illusions.

title: Kimi no Na wa.
description: A connection between two people that transcends distance and time. A story about searching, memory, and feelings that cannot be forgotten.

title: Byousoku 5 Centimeter
description: A quiet and painfully honest look at love that cannot withstand distance and time. About how easily the most important things can be lost.

title: Angel Beats!
description: A world after death where unresolved feelings must be faced. A story about acceptance, farewell, and the right to move on.

title: No Game No Life
description: A reality where intellect decides everything. A high-stakes adventure about strategy, logic, and absolute faith in one’s own mind.

title: Re:Zero
description: Each death leaves a mark, even when time is reset. A dark story about pain, despair, and the price of a second chance.

title: Tensei shitara Slime Datta
description: An unusual reincarnation becomes the beginning of a long journey. A story about power, diplomacy, and building a world from scratch.

title: Date a Live
description: Saving the world is possible not only through force, but through sincere feelings. A lighthearted story about dates, spirits, and strange compromises.

title: Zero no Tsukaima
description: An accidental summoning binds two completely different people. A fantasy about trust, growth, and relationships born from a mistake.

title: Black Bullet
description: A harsh world where children are forced to become weapons. A story about fear, survival, and fragile humanity.

title: Akame ga Kill!
description: A fight against an unjust system where every victory may be the last. A dark fantasy about the price of revolution.

title: OreGairu
description: Cynical views clash with sincere feelings. A slow and honest story about complicated relationships and growing up.

title: Baka to Test
description: An absurd school system where grades determine the outcome of battles. A comedy about stupidity, friendship, and unexpected cleverness.

title: Mirai Nikki
description: Knowing the future does not protect from madness. A brutal survival game where trust becomes deadly.

title: Happy Sugar Life
description: A distorted perception of love leads to terrifying decisions. A psychological drama hidden beneath a cute everyday facade.

title: Horimiya
description: School romance without unnecessary drama. A story about self-acceptance and quiet closeness between ordinary people.

title: Ijiranaide, Nagatoro-san
description: Teasing gradually turns into trust. A light story about awkwardness, affection, and growing confidence.

title: Kill la Kill
description: Mad action where style itself is power. Beneath the chaos and absurdity lies a story about freedom and self-determination.

title: Jashin-chan Dropkick
description: Pure absurdity and brutal humor about a demon who cannot return home. A comedy with no brakes.

title: Release the Spyce
description: A secret war disguised as school life. A story about trust, mentorship, and hidden threats.

title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
description: Science and magic collide in a world of hidden conflicts. An adventure about choice, belief, and the consequences of power.

title: Kishuku Gakkou no Juliet
description: Love on opposite sides of the barricades. A light and sincere story about feelings that must be kept secret.

title: Tokyo Ravens
description: Modern magic and ancient rituals pull students into dangerous events. A fantasy about fate and choice.

title: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni
description: Behind a peaceful village lies a recurring nightmare. A story about paranoia, fear, and shattered trust.

title: Seto no Hanayome
description: A forced marriage becomes a source of chaos and humor. A romantic comedy with a frantic pace.

title: Tonari no Alya-san
description: Romance where sincere feelings hide behind jokes and another language. A light story about affection and attentiveness.

title: Masamune-kun no Revenge
description: A carefully planned revenge begins to crack because of feelings. A comedy about self-deception and unexpected twists.

title: Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso
description: Music becomes a way to feel alive again. A story about the pain of loss and the power of inspiration.

title: Monogatari
description: Dialogues and strange encounters reveal the characters’ inner conflicts. An unusual take on everyday problems.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Curses born from emotions become a real threat. A dynamic action story about fear, duty, and choice.

title: Gimai Seikatsu
description: Living together changes boundaries and feelings. A calm drama about awkwardness, attachment, and honesty.

title: Watashi ga Koibito
description: A light romantic confusion where feelings turn out to be more complex than words. A comedy about self-discovery and closeness.
